homePage.aboutUsTxt:
Furnished with the latest and the finest equipment in cosmetology, Happy Nails offers professional Spa treatments. Metal implemented are sterilized and sealed in special sterile pouches similar to ones used in the medical field to ensure sanitation and hygiene.
 
Our Spa pedicure services improve not only your visual appeal but also your physical well being. With a variety of Spa services and pedicures to meet your needs, Happy Nails is the perfect place to relieve your stress and rejuvenate your body.

team.name: Elliot sds
team.about: Elliot is a well educated and fine stylist. She has been doing this for over 100 years!

team.name: Miguel Louise
team.about: Miguel is a great gal and loves doing her job to the best of her ability. she will be happy to do your nails or your hair.
